group_1.textRight: ...Kira?
Heeey, Kira!

group_1.textLeft: ...Yes?

group_1.textRight: This isn't like you.
You've had your book opened to that page for a@while now...
But you haven't made any progress at all, right?

group_1.textLeft: Yes... Witch-fighting strategies are all I've@been able to think about lately.
But you're not one to talk either, are you,@Komachi?
You haven't even picked up anything@history-related yet.
Instead, you've got your nose in your phone.@Also unlike you.

group_1.textRight: ...You've got a point.
Mihono hasn't called me at all since then, so@I'm worried...
Ah, finally!

group_1.textLeft: What's she saying?

group_1.textRight: She fell asleep in class, apparently...

group_1.textLeft: ...From exhaustion, I'm sure.

group_1.textRight: She says she's coming to meet us.@Let's wait for her in the hall.

group_1.textLeft: Komachi, I'm terribly sorry to bring this up@so suddenly, but...

group_1.textRight: Don't worry about it! All of your conversations@are sudden. [chara:303801:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:303801:cheek_0][chara:303801:motion_1][chara:303801:lipSynch_1]...So, what is it?

group_1.textLeft: Do you think we need a personal oasis?

group_1.textRight: A personal oasis...?

group_1.textLeft: Somewhere where we can do what we like...@Physically relax...
Just think of it as a place where we can@calm our minds, in short.

group_1.textRight: So... an after-school hangout spot?

group_1.textLeft: A frank way of putting it, but yes.
It's not that I mind whispering to each other@in the library lobby...
Or talking here in the hallway, but...

group_1.textRight: It's tough to relax, yeah.

group_1.textLeft: Right.
We have to constantly stay on our guard.@Not just when fighting a Witch...
...But both before and after our hunts,@as well.
Since we're constantly in such a state, we've been@doing nothing but building up stress each day.
Even birds can't fly indefinitely.
They need a perch to rest on.

group_1.textRight: Thus, an "oasis"...?

group_1.textLeft: Yes.
Neither of us can even spare the time to indulge@in our literary hobbies.
And Mihono hasn't even mentioned movies as of@late.
At this rate, it's not just our hobbies that@we'll be missing out on.
It'll be difficult to even maintain a regular@lifestyle.
That's why I feel that we need an oasis...
...A place where we can rest easy...

group_1.textRight: ...You're right.
What exactly should we do, though?@Meet up at a cafe somewhere?
I've been listening to your conversation!

group_1.textLeft: Mihono? How long have you been there?

group_1.textRight: In fact, I've been thinking that very same@thing!
I'd like to have a more normal high-school club@experience, too...!
